snippet: Instead of sailing against the elements, the crews of the America’s Cup are sailing a stranger race.
abstract: Editorial contends that America’s Cup has become unrecognizable version of its former self, with extreme focus on corporate sponsorship and unstable, high-tech vessels; holds event is now marked by a macabre anxiety over when next crash will occur.
lead_paragraph: Instead of sailing against the elements, the crews of the America’s Cup are sailing a stranger race.
